help:
Welcome to **Architect**! 🏗️

Architect is a powerful Discord app integrated with the Model Context Protocol (MCP) to provide AI-driven automation and administration for your Discord server.

You can chat with Architect by mentioning it with `@Architect` or by replying to one of its previous messages.

**Security:** Architect will only reply to members with **Administrator** privileges to ensure your server's security.

**Note:** The chatbot is only available in server channels and does not respond to direct messages (DMs).

Use natural language commands to manage categories, channels, roles, permissions, send messages, and much more—all through conversational AI!

Happy building! 🚀
